"Hero Twin Machineguns":
"When Twin Machineguns are equipped by a Hero, they perform \"Hero Twin Machinegun\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Twin Machinegun attacks.

Hero Twin Machineguns have much longer range than regular Twin Machineguns, and can fire continuously to deal a lot of damage.

Some Hero Twin Machinegun PAs automatically switch to other Hero weapons if you hold the PA button."

"Hero Twin Machineguns consume PP even when using normal attacks.

Their main way to recover PP is their Weapon Action, \"Reload\".

You can reload for as long as you need by holding the Weapon Action button.

Also, if you Reload with Just Attack timing, you will perform a \"Just Reload\", which recovers PP much faster than normal."

"When equipped with Hero Twin Machineguns, potentials that affect PP regeneration and PP consumption apply in the following ways.

PP regeneration potentials apply when the weapon is sheathed and when Reloading.

PP consumption potentials apply to normal attacks in addition to Photon Arts and Techniques."
